infos.value: Wh-why you little...! Who do you think you are?
You don't want us to get serious...
Yer don't wanna know what happens if yer wound th' little rat.
But tell me, how does that make you feel?
He's from Leonis, aye? Aren't you meant to be bitter enemies?
Yeah. That's exactly th' reason why I let him come.
Oelde is going to die at th' hands o' his own son.
Just imagining it gets my blood goin'.
After he's taken care of Oelde, we can have our way with him, aye?
Hear that, boy? That's how it is.
Get rid of Oelde for us nice and quick. We'll save our fun for after that, aye?
